channel.title: Kingdom Commentaries
channel.description: Theological discussion with various guests on biblical and Christian topics. Not a sermon

item.title: 0009 Antithesis Hour, End Of Sin
item.description: Roderick Edwards, a historic Christian in discussion with RiversOfEden, a full or hyperpreterist.

item.title: 0008 Antithesis Hour, Mailbag Medley
item.description: Roderick Edwards, a historic Christian in discussion with RiversOfEden, a full or hyperpreterist.

item.title: 0007 Antithesis Hour, The Judgment
item.description: Roderick Edwards, a historic Christian in discussion with RiversOfEden, a full or hyperpreterist.

item.title: 0006 Antithesis Hour, Born Again
item.description: Roderick Edwards, a historic Christian in discussion with RiversOfEden, a full or hyperpreterist.

item.title: 0005 Antithesis Hour, Christian Resurrection
item.description: Roderick Edwards, a historic Christian in discussion with RiversOfEden, a full or hyperpreterist.

item.title: 0004 Antithesis Hour, Introduction to The Resurrection
item.description: Roderick Edwards, a historic Christian in discussion with RiversOfEden, a full or hyperpreterist.

item.title: 0003 Antithesis Hour, Time-Texts (Con't)
item.description: New series of opposing controversial views.

item.title: 0002 Antithesis Hour, Time-Texts
item.description: New series of opposing controversial views.

item.title: 0001 Antithesis Hour, Defining Hyperpreterism
item.description: New series of opposing controversial views.

item.title: AD70.net and Preterist Hypocrisy
item.description: Discussion with a Full-Hyperpreterist the hypocrisy within Hyperpreterism.

item.title: The Martin Luther of Hyperpreterism
item.description: Discussion with a Full-Hyperpreterist on the consistent and logical conclusions of Full-Hyperpreterism.

item.title: Introduction to Presuppositionalism With Dr. James Anderson
item.description: Discussion with Dr. James Anderson of RTS on the topic of Presuppositionalism

item.title: Consistent Conclusions of Full/Hyperpreterism
item.description: Rivers of Eden discusses how a consistent application of Full/Hyperpreterism should lead to the conclusion that God has gathered all of the Elect and is done with His redemptive plan for humanity.

item.title: Apostolic Bible Polyglot 2010
item.description: Charles VanderPool discusses unique Greek interlinear Bible translation.

item.title: Singing Praise to the Lord in Psalms
item.description: Michael Owens discusses singing in the church.

item.title: Origin of Classic Christmas Carols
item.description: Researcher and author Ron Clancy explains the origins of many loved Christmas carols.

item.title: Roderick Edwards Leaves The Cause
item.description: Roderick Edwards discusses why he is no longer in the cause against the heresy of hyperpreterism.

item.title: Exclusive Psalmody -- Biblical or not?.
item.description: Roderick Edwards discusses singing only psalms in church.

item.title: TKC Update 2009 -- Summary of 2009 Projects
item.description: Roderick Edwards discusses 2009 projects.

item.title: Roderick on the Radio -- Discussing Hyperpreterism
item.description: Roderick Edwards interviewed on the Irons Sharpens Iron radio show.

item.title: Music of the Reformation and Renaissance
item.description: A discussion with Jeremy Fowler-Lindemulder about Reformation and Renaissance music.

item.title: What is Determinism?
item.description: A discussion with Monty Collier on God's determinism or Sovereign will.

item.title: The Judaizers Were Christians Too
item.description: A study about how to treat people who call themselves 'Christians' but teach things that are not anything like historic Christianity.

item.title: There's Something About Gary Pt 1
item.description: A discussion about how some partial-preterist are validating the heresy of hyperpreterism.

item.title: There's Something About Gary Pt 2
item.description: A discussion about how some partial-preterist are validating the heresy of hyperpreterism.

item.title: A Real Discussion with Brian Simmons
item.description: Brian Simmons discusses his experience on a hyperpreterist podcast as well as general refuting that cultic view.

item.title: PreteristPodCast Interview
item.description: Roderick Edwards and Dee Dee Warren discuss the obscure cultish belief called hyperpreterism.

item.title: Left Behind Answered
item.description: David Reed discusses his new book refuting the idea of a future tribulation.

item.title: Interview with a Former Full-Preterist
item.description: Roderick Edwards on the Narrow Mind radio show discusses his renouncement of Full-Preterism.

item.title: Living Reformed
item.description: Michael Leach discusses the distinctives of living a Reformed Christian life.

item.title: Reformed Evangelism
item.description: Tim Micer discusses the difference between modern evangelism and Reformed or original biblical evangelism.

item.title: Out of Egypt: An Escape from Islam
item.description: Nabil, a Coptic Christian discusses his life in Islamic Egypt.

item.title: Obeying Authorities: Can Christians Ever Disobey Civil Authorities?
item.description: Steve Klein discusses biblical concepts about obeying and disobeying civil authorities and lawful order.

item.title: Examining the House Church Movement
item.description: Keith Throop discussing the House Church Movement from a contrasting view point.

item.title: Opposing Islam
item.description: Steve Klein discusses his experiences with trying to inform and alert Americans to the dangers of Islam.

item.title: In Support of the Gospel with Todd Friel
item.description: Todd Friel of wayofthemaster.com discusses how to properly and effectively present the Gospel in love yet without compromising to the watered down versions often given by trendy preachers.

item.title: Ekklesia - Biblical House Church
item.description: Brian Anderson and Jon Zens discuss the House Church model and the book Ekklesia.

item.title: Investigating Islam
item.description: Vietnam Veteran Steve Klein relates how he is applying his experience with Viet-Cong cell groups to interacting with Islamic cell groups that are intent on bringing down America from within.

item.title: Did God Make Them Black?
item.description: Isaac Olaleye discusses his book and the research he has done via the Bible and science to determine the origin of the races.

item.title: The Origins of Racism
item.description: Michael Leach of All Saints Redeemer Church discusses the so-called Hamite/Canaanite curse of Gen 9:25

item.title: Church Leadership Models
item.description: Jon Zens of searchingtogether.com and Roderick Edwards of thekingdomcome.com give an overview of the history of church leadership models. See accompanying article at thekingdomcome.com/church_leadership_models

item.title: Apostolic Bible Complete Greek Interlinear
item.description: Charles Van der Pool of apostolicbible.com discusses his translation that utilizes the OT Septuagint combined with the Greek NT

item.title: Pastoral Authority within Church
item.description: Discussion with Jon Zens from searchingtogether.org about the validity of the office of pastor and the practice of sermonizing.

item.title: Winning the War on Terror
item.description: Prof Larry Schweikart of Dayton University and author of America's Victories talks about the war on terror and about the war on ideologies.

item.title: Black Calvinism
item.description: Discussion with Michael Leach about the history of Reformed Theology within the black community.

item.title: Being a Single Christian
item.description: Discussion with John Cosper from getyoked.net about being a single Christian

item.title: Winning Beliefs Wins
item.description: Discussion with Dr. Larry Schweikart of the University of Dayton about his book, America's Victories

item.title: Christian Parodies Randy Hyde Interview
item.description: Interview with Randy Hyde singer of Christian parodies of secular songs

item.title: WittenburgDoor Interview
item.description: Interview with Robert Darden the senior editor of the Door magazine

item.title: Kingdom Commentaries Intro Music
item.description: Intro music to the Kingdom Commentaries podcast.
